00024 char CHTMLBookDisplay::Display( CSwordModuleInfo* module ){
00025     CSwordBookModuleInfo* book = dynamic_cast<CSwordBookModuleInfo*>(module);
00026     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordTreeKey> key( dynamic_cast<CSwordTreeKey*>( CSwordKey::createInstance(book) ) );
00027     m_htmlText = QString::null;
00028     
00029     if (!module || !key) {      
00030         return 0;
00031     }   
00032     const int displayLevel = book->config( CSwordModuleInfo::DisplayLevel ).toInt();
00033     key->key(book->module()->KeyText());        
00034     updateSettings();   
00035     if (!displayLevel) {
00036         m_htmlText = key->renderedText();
00037         return 0;
00038     }   
00039     const QString oldKey = key->key();          
00040 
00041     int moved = 0;
00042     
00043     while (key->firstChild())
00044         ++moved; //down
00045 
00046     for (int i = 1; i < displayLevel; i++) {
00047         if (!key->parent() || key->key() == "/" || key->key().isEmpty()) {
00048             break;      
00049         }
00050         --moved; //up
00051     };
00052     
00053     if (moved <= 1) { //display entries together
00054         while(key->previousSibling()); //first entry of it's parent     
00055         printTree(*key, book);  
00056         key->key(oldKey);
00057         return 1;   
00058     }
00059     else { //do not display entries together
00060         key->key(oldKey.isNull() ? "/" : oldKey);
00061         m_htmlText = key->renderedText();
00062         return 1;
00063     }   
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CHTMLBookDisplay::printTree(CSwordTreeKey treeKey, CSwordBookModuleInfo* module, const int levelPos){
00067   m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<A NAME=\"%1\" HREF=\"%2\">%3</A>: %4<BR>")
00068     .arg(treeKey.getLocalName())
00069     .arg(CReferenceManager::encodeHyperlink(module->name(), treeKey.getFullName(), CReferenceManager::GenericBook))
00070     .arg(treeKey.getFullName())
00071     .arg(treeKey.renderedText());   
00072     
00073   if (treeKey.hasChildren()) {
00074     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<H3>%1</H3>").arg(treeKey.getFullName());
00075     treeKey.firstChild();
00076     printTree(treeKey, module, levelPos+1);
00077     treeKey.parent();
00078   }
00079   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00080         printTree(treeKey, module, levelPos);
00081 }
